txt.en: 'I am told that everything is in order. Shall we speak with my family?'
'The ship is almost ready to depart, mother. Do not fret, there are still many places to search for father.'
'I will be on it, my son. The city is yours, but there's nary a thing left for me, here. Just remember what he taught you.'
'I shall do my best to honour his traditions.'
'Siriel, my wonderful sister. Are you ready to set sail?'
'I do not wish to go, but I understand why. Even still, promise me that you will keep looking for father!'
'If our father is still out there, then I shall find him, I promise you that.'
'These vessels will sail towards peaceful waters, and for that I am relieved.'
